verbose_text: Further, there is compelling evidence that generation of the reactive oxygen species nitric oxide (NO *) by neuronal nitric oxide synthase (nNOS) is increased during and after HI, and that reaction of NO * with superoxide in the cytosol and mitochondria produces peroxynitrite and other reactive nitrogen species that are associated with cell membrane, organelle and mitochondrial damage.
evidence: NO* with superoxide in the cytosol and mitochondria produces peroxynitrite and other reactive nitrogen
